nodes.text: Pateesa was a phrase uttered occasionally by Cade Skywalker and Jariah Syn, apparently a term of endearment. It was used in regards to K'Kruhk, probably sarcastically as though it were an insult. When used by Cade toward Deliah Blue it meant "sweetie" or "darling," and between Cade and Syn it meant "friend" or "buddy."
